while t:
    n = int(input())
    arr = input().split(' ')
    min1 = 10 ** 9
    min2 = 10 ** 9
    for i in range(n):
        if int(arr[i]) <= min1:
            min2 = min1
            min1 = int(arr[i])
            continue
        if int(arr[i]) < min2:
            min2 = int(arr[i])
    print(min1 + min2)
    t = t - 1
